alert.note: Alert for Habersham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 03 at 12:30PM EST until January 04 at 11:48AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Habersham County near the Soque River. * WHEN...Until 245 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1230 PM EST, Minor flooding of low-lying and poor drainage areas along the Soque River will linger through mid-afternoon with water levels falling later today. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Clarkesville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life.
